long_description: The Backpacker's Pantry freeze-dried Egg White Omelet starts your day off right in the backcountry with a blend of egg whites, bell peppers, cheese, onions and spices. Add 1 cup of water a little at a time until blended smooth; cook over low heat in a nonstick pan and stir frequently. Serves 2. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The Backpacker's Pantry freeze-dried Egg White Omelet starts your day off right in the backcountry with a blend of egg whites, bell peppers, cheese, onions and spices.
